content.p: Staff and students from the CSCC have recently begun contributing a bimonthly column entitled 'Critical Voices' to Malaysiakini, reflecting on and discussing issues of contemporary communication and culture in the Malaysian context, as well as further afield. You can find our archived contributions below, and check Malaysiakini for further instalments from the CSCC 'Critical Voices' series! You can also find regular columns in Malaysiakini and The Heat from the CSCC's founder, Professor Zaharom Nain. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8693 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
